text: Edward Alfred Cecil Henry Brown (4 October 1927 – 4 April 1996) was an English professional football centre forward who played in the Football League for Aldershot. == References == Category:1927 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Footballers from St Pancras, London Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Brentford F.C. players Category:Torquay United F.C. players Category:Aldershot F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Eddie Brown (footballer, born 1927)
